targets.query: SELECT toDateTime(event_date) as time, avg(lock_time) as avg_lock_time FROM techlog WHERE event_date >= NOW() - interval 30 day GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT toDate(event_date) as time, avg(lock_time) as lock_time, avg(avg(lock_time)) OVER (ORDER BY toDate(event_date) ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as trend_7d FROM techlog GROUP BY toDate(event_date) ORDER BY time

SELECT table_name, count(*) as lock_count, avg(lock_time) as avg_lock_time, max(lock_time) as max_lock_time FROM techlog WHERE event_date >= NOW() - interval 7 day GROUP BY table_name ORDER BY lock_count DESC LIMIT 10
